Read: 
- [Chapter 1 of Exploratory Data Analysis by John Tukey](https://unl.alma.exlibrisgroup.com/leganto/public/01UON_LINC/citation/12340320650006387?auth=SAML) (available on Canvas)

Annotate using hypothes.is (not the built in annotation tool)

Think about/comment on: 

- What do you think about Tukey's approach to exploratory data analysis?
- What new ways to use Stem and Leaf plots did you learn?
- How has the use of computers made EDA easier? harder?
